summary: Ryan Reynolds: Presenta Un Avance De La Película ‘Detective Pikachu’
title: Ryan Reynolds: Presenta Un Avance De La Película ‘Detective Pikachu’
body:
La tan esperada película ‘Detective Pikachu’, está muy cerca de llegar a la pantalla grande. Después que se nos presentó el trailer oficial surgió más interés por la película. Tanto así que los productores estiman más de 200 Millones de dólares en la primera semana. Dicho esto, hace pocas horas el actor Ryan Reynolds el cual es quien le da vida al pokemon Pikachu, subió un video a través de sucue…

summary:
“You found yourself a Pokemon partner!”
“Oh, this feels so good.... What happens?”
““I’m a world-class detective!”
“You wanna...
body:
“You found yourself a Pokemon partner!”

“Oh, this feels so good…. What happens?”

““I’m a world-class detective!”
“You wanna find your pops? I’m your best bet!”

“Let’s do this!”

“No, no. We’re not gonna do that.”
“Fine, I’ll walk. I’ll try to get in a hundred-thousand steps this hour.”

“Your childhood bed is a Pikachu bed? I’ve never been so flattered and creeped out at the same time.”

“Your childhood bed is a Pikachu bed? I’ve never been so flattered and creeped out at the same time.”

summary: I went to Target yesterday with my mom and saw this SUPER CUTE detective Pikachu plush there, along with some other plush...
body: I went to Target yesterday with my mom and saw this SUPER CUTE detective Pikachu plush there, along with some other plush (including a super bad looking poseable Mr. Mime and Mewtwo…which sound cool on paper but they were super silly looking!). I went back today because I had a feeling that they would sell out fast and I was right- there was only one big detective Pikachu left and half of the other plush were gone! I got home and my mom was cooking and she said, “Why don’t I just cook Pikachu too?” XD (OH NO!!)

reblog.comment: I went to Target yesterday with my mom and saw this SUPER CUTE detective Pikachu plush there, along with some other plush (including a super bad looking poseable Mr. Mime and Mewtwo…which sound cool on paper but they were super silly looking!). title: Pokemon Universe
body:
Before the release of Detective Pikachu there is already a sequel in development. IGN had an interview with Legendary Entertainment producer Ali Mendes and they said that the universe of Pokemon is so large and rich that there are a lot of opportunity to create new stories and there are over 800 pokemon that could be deserving of their own screening time. This could be the start of a franchise of Pokemon movies in a era of Hollywood that loves cinematic universes. 

https://www.ign.com/articles/2019/03/18/pokemon-cinematic-universe-a-possibility-after-detective-pikachu

summary: Ended up watching the Japanese subbed version of the Detective Pikachu trailer, gotta say, the Japanese cover of 'I Need a Hero'...
